name: Green Top
storyline:
The Robot World has been taken over by copper-eating grass. You wake up in a junkyard as a copper robot with no arms and you have the ability to use leftover parts from scrapped or infected robots.

In the junkyard, you find a fire robot with a flamethrower arm that you salvage from his remains and equip. This arm allows you to burn the Green (the copper-eating vegetation) and boosts your jumps. Hidden in a secret room in the junkyard, you find a water robot, partially decimated by the Green. You grab and equip its arm which allows you to spread the infection to other copper tiles.

With the option to burn the Green or spread it, which one will you choose?
summary: The Robot World has been taken over by copper-eating grass. Will you be able to get rid of the plague as a copper robot to return the world to its former mechanical glory? Dive into the adventure in this puzzle platformer metroidvania where climbable surface is an expendable resource!
